hero.title: About FielMedina
hero.subtitle: We're passionate about preserving and sharing the rich cultural heritage of Sousse medina through innovative technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: FielMedina was born from a deep love for Sousse's historical medina and a vision to make cultural heritage accessible to everyone. We combine cutting-edge technology with authentic storytelling to create immersive experiences that connect visitors with the soul of this UNESCO World Heritage site.

heritage.title: Cultural Heritage
heritage.description: Preserving and celebrating the rich history of Sousse medina for future generations.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Using modern technology to enhance traditional cultural experiences.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building bridges between locals and visitors through shared stories and experiences.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: Ensuring every story and experience reflects the true spirit of Sousse.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate individuals dedicated to bringing Sousse's heritage to life

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: From concept to the leading cultural app for Sousse medina

2023.title: App Launch
2023.description: FielMedina officially launched, bringing digital heritage tours to Sousse medina.

2024.title: Community Growth
2024.description: Reached 1,000+ downloads and expanded our collection of stories and locations.

2025.title: Future Plans
2025.description: Expanding to other Tunisian heritage sites and introducing new interactive features.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about FielMedina
faq.a1: Yes! FielMedina is completely free to download and use. We believe cultural heritage should be accessible to everyone.
faq.a2: Absolutely! Once you download the content, you can explore the medina and access stories even without an internet connection.
faq.q3: How accurate is the GPS navigation?
faq.a3: Our GPS system is highly accurate within the medina. We've carefully mapped every location to ensure precise navigation through the historic streets.
faq.q4: Can I contribute my own stories or photos?
faq.a4: We love community contributions! Please contact us through this form to discuss how you can share your knowledge and experiences.
